page.title: Pathway Diagram View
page.introduction:
Displays in a graphical form the entities selected by the user in the Pathway Panel. It can be used to examine their properties, import them within the model and manage their link status with model entities.
It is the graph format representation of the Pathway Objects View .
page.appearance:
The view represents various entity types as circles and the relationships between them as full or dotted lines. The screenshot below shows two biochemical reactions and their dependent entities.
The bottom pane of the window displays a Pathway Object Properties Pane where the properties of a selected entity are being displayed.
page.operations:
More entities can be added from the Pathway Panel.
The user can perform various operations upon these entities, either on individually selected entities or multiple selected entities using the Operations Toolbar .
